meanings.definition: A physical feeling or perception resulting from something that happens to or comes into contact with the body.
meanings.sent1: The gentle sensation of a warm hug filled her with comfort.
meanings.sent2: The sensation of the soft breeze on her skin was delightful.
meanings.sent3: Feeling the ticklish sensation of feathers on her nose, she couldn't help but giggle.
meanings.sent4: The sensation of floating on a cloud captured her imagination.
meanings.sent5: The sharp sensation of a pinprick made her jump in surprise.

meanings.definition: A widespread reaction of interest or excitement.
meanings.sent1: The sensation of the crowd cheering at the concert was electrifying.
meanings.sent2: The sensation of winning the game filled him with joy.
meanings.sent3: Experiencing the sensation of everyone clapping for her made her blush.
meanings.sent4: The sensation of fireworks lighting up the sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The sensation of a surprise party left him speechless with happiness.
